Occupation History:
Seppälä Lehtinen Laaksonen is a 58 year old Real Estate Investment Trust (REIT) CEO from Finland. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Seppälä Lehtinen Laaksonen launched his career as a Property Manager at Citycon Oyj, where he gained valuable experience from 1990 to 1991.
His subsequent role was as a Developer at Technopolis Plc, where he continued to grow professionally from 1991 to 1995.
In 1996, he joined Skanska Talonrakennus Oy as a Construction Company Owner, taking on new challenges and responsibilities that helped him grow both personally and professionally.
His next role was as a Real Estate Investment Trust (REIT) CEO at Skanska Talonrakennus Oy, where he applied his extensive experience to drive innovation from 2000 till now.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 2240000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
